mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FINDDOG (CATEGORY, WRITER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, AREA, BREED) VALUES (#{category}, #{writerId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{area}, #{breed})
mapper.select: SELECT FINDDOG_NO FROM TB_FINDDOG ORDER BY FINDDOG_NO DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TB_FINDDOG
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchMap.title}, '%')
AND CATEGORY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchMap.category}, '%')
AND STATE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchMap.state}, '%')

mapper.update: UPDATE TB_FINDDOG SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, BREED = #{breed}, AREA = #{area}, LATITUDE = #{latitude}, LONGITUDE = #{longitude} WHERE FINDDOG_NO = #{findDogNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FINDDOG_REPLY (FINDDOG_NO, WRITER_ID, CONTENT) VALUES (#{findDogNo}, #{writerId}, #{content})
